commands: runuser -l ec2-user -c 'SKIP_VALIDATION=True FP_TAG=1.0.3 DS_TAG=1.0.2 NGIAB_TAG=v1.6.0 && /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/scripts/datastream -s DAILY -n $NPROCS -F s3://ciroh-community-ngen-datastream/v2.2/ngen.DAILY/forcing_$RUN_TYPE_L/$INIT/ngen.t$INITz.$RUN_TYPE_L.forcing.$FCST.VPU_$VPU.nc --FORCING_SOURCE NWM_V3_$RUN_TYPE_H_$INIT_$MEMBER -d /home/ec2-user/outputs -r s3://ciroh-community-ngen-datastream/v2.2_resources/VPU_$VPU -N https://ciroh-community-ngen-datastream.s3.amazonaws.com/v2.2_resources/lstm_conus_cat_config.tar.gz -R https://ciroh-community-ngen-datastream.s3.amazonaws.com/realizations/realization_lstm_rust.json --S3_BUCKET ciroh-community-ngen-datastream --S3_PREFIX outputs/lstm/v2.2_hydrofabric/ngen.DAILY/$RUN_TYPE_L/$INIT/$MEMBER/VPU_$VPU'
